    You'll Never Be Rich


    10 Dec 2024

    Over the past decade, there‚Äôs been a growing epidemic of excess. Influencers on social media flaunting expensive cars, designer clothing, big houses (so you wanna be a rock superstar), and then, of course, the extremely lucky Youtubers, TikTokers, and so on and so forth, who make it big because they hit the algorithm correctly. But, in all reality, this is a small amount of people who do these things. Becoming rich and famous is not something the average person, or most people, will ever attain. It‚Äôs like they say, you have more in common with a homeless person, than a billionaire.

    Consolidation to One


    08 Dec 2024

    Today I decided to consolidate my website to just one place, i.e., the place where it originates, and is built each time: Github. I‚Äôm mostly doing this because I‚Äôve allowed some of my bills to get out of control, and I‚Äôm paying for things I really don‚Äôt need to be. After using Neocities for a long time, I‚Äôve found the social aspect isn‚Äôt really ‚Ä¶ worth it. People don‚Äôt really pay any attention to website feeds on there. And, even with the allowed 50 gigs of space on Neocities, you‚Äôre still limited to the suggested 1 gig limit on Github.
